name: Kozuki Momonosuke
text:
Blocker - (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
On Play: Place up to one of your (Wano) type characters other than (Kozuki Momonosuke) on the top or bottom of its owners life pile face-up.

effect.text: (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
Place up to one of your (Wano) type characters other than (Kozuki Momonosuke) on the top or bottom of its owners life pile face-up.
